Constructor Detail

Clock

public Clock()
Creates a clock without an image and with a width equal to 192

Clock

public Clock(java.lang.String url,
             int width)
Creates a clock component. An image can be used to fill the clock component.

Parameters:
url - an url of an image to use for background if null no image will be set
width - the width for the image and so for the clock.
